TaskNumber4

Class Elf

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • TaskNumber4.Demon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Elf
extends java.lang.Thread
    moves and creates gifts

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HomeMadeCyclicBarrier barrier
      cyclic barrier used to make elves wait when they are on the main diagonal untill there are elves on all positions of the main diagonal

      current number of presents created by elves.

      TaskNumber4.IPotionQueue gift_queue
      queue of gifts; common with a coven, elves and reindeers

      a lock used to ensure exclusive access to the elf positions in a map

      position on x and y coordinated of an elf in a coven

    • Field Detail

      • elf_current_number_of_presents

        public static volatile int elf_current_number_of_presents
        current number of presents created by elves. When this is equal with the goal, all threads except reindeers can stop working

      • gift_lock

        public static java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock gift_lock
        a lock used to ensure exclusive access to the number o gifts variable

      • move_lock

        public static java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock move_lock
        a lock used to ensure exclusive access to the elf positions in a map

      • position

        private Position position
        position on x and y coordinated of an elf in a coven

      • gift_queue

        public TaskNumber4.IPotionQueue gift_queue
        queue of gifts; common with a coven, elves and reindeers

        dimmension of the matrix coven the elf belongs to

        map that contains all elves positions

      • factory_id

        public int factory_id
        identifier of the coven the elf belongs to

      • barrier

        public HomeMadeCyclicBarrier barrier
        cyclic barrier used to make elves wait when they are on the main diagonal untill there are elves on all positions of the main diagonal

    • Constructor Detail

      • Elf

        Elf(Position position,
    int factory_size,
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Elf> elf_map_position,
    TaskNumber4.IPotionQueue gift_queue,
    int factory_id,
    HomeMadeCyclicBarrier barrier)
        Constructor of the Elf class. Used to initialize fields
        Parameters:
        position - Coordinates x and y of elf in coven
        factory_size - coven size
        elf_map_position - Map that has the coordinates of all elves in factor
        gift_queue - queue where elves write gifts
        factory_id - coven identifier
        barrier - cyclic barrier used to make elves wait when they are on the main diagonal untill there are elves on all positions of the main diagonal

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        public Position getPosition()
        Returns the position of an elf in the coven
        Parameters:
        position - Coordinates x and y of elf in coven

      • checkIfOnDiagonalAndRestOrJump

        private void checkIfOnDiagonalAndRestOrJump()
        Checks if the elf moved on the main diagonal. If so, generate a random value 1 or 0 in order to choose if the elf waits at the barrier or makes another move. If the choice is 1, call await method of the barrier

      • run

        public void run()
        Main method called when thread starts Move elf, check if it is on diagonal and try to stop elf
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • tryToStopElf

        private void tryToStopElf()
        try to acquire a semaphore permit for an amount of time and if you succeed the elf enters a finite retirement state

      • moveElf

        private void moveElf()
        check if the elf can move in a direction and if so move, otherwise sleep

      • canMoveRight

        private boolean canMoveRight()
        Checks if the elf can move right, i.e. there isn't another elf there and the elf is still within the coven boundaries
        Returns:
        true if he can move, false otherwise

      • moveRight

        private void moveRight()
        update position and call methods to increment number of gifts and to rest

      • canMoveUp

        private boolean canMoveUp()
        Checks if the elf can move up, i.e. there isn't another elf there and the elf is still within the coven boundaries
        Returns:
        true if he can move, false otherwise
